titleStmt.title: This court now considering the frequent neglects of divers of the head officers of this city, to perform their duty in walking before the Lord Mayor and Aldermen ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Clayton, Robert, Sir, 1629-1707.

notesStmt.note: Title from first three lines of text.
At head of title: Clayton mayor. Jovis decimo sexto die Septembris, 1680. Annoque regni Regis Caroli Secundi, Angliæ, &c. Tricesimo secundo.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
